resources.string: Click Here To Continue To OAU Eportal Home Page

As part of the ongoing scheduled maintenance of the University e-portal, you may be requested to change your password to a new one. Kindly follow the instructions given. Continue to access the e-portal with your new password. Wishing you a happy session..
Click Here To Download Information for 2019/2020 Academic Session
Bed space request for Final Year Students will commence on Friday, 28th February, 2020 by 7.00pm To Continue
All enquiries or problems will be addressed via the following online channels: E-mail:- enquiry@oauife.edu.ng
